profile.title: Yuza Profil
profile.mustLogin: Yu fo sign in bifor yu go si di settings.
profile.noPrivateKey: Nɔ get prívit ki pan dis dɪvays fɔ eksport.
profile.setBackupPassword: Set wan paswɔd fɔ enkrip yu backup:
profile.enterBackupPassword: Enter di paswɔd fɔ dis backup:
profile.importSuccess: Prívit ki don import go dis dɪvays.
profile.importFailed: Import fɔl (rong paswɔd ɔ di fayl don bad).
profile.keysRotated: Nyu ki pɛa jenɛret en pɔblik ki don upload.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Yu prívit ki nɔ de liv dis dɪvays. Ekspɔt wan we get paswɔd so yu go fít risɒt am pan ɔda dɪvays.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Yu de pan Free—yus di quick Sun/Moon opshɔn dɛn na dɔŋ. Upgrade fɔ opɔn mɔ tim dɛn.
profile.backupDesc: Mek backup we get paswɔd fɔ yu ki dɛn, en risɒt am pan ɔda dɪvays fɔ synk.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Blɔ mesij dɛn bifo ɔl tin
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Blɔ we app nɔ de na fɔkus
profile.notifyOnCopy: Lɛm mi nɔ if sɔmbɔdi kɔpi mi mesij
profile.followHint: Den stɔri go sho na yu Following fid if den post am fɔ Followers ɔ Public.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Sɔntin gɛt rɔŋ na dis sɛkshɔn.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fɔwad inkomin kɔl dɛn en tɛks dɛn go yu vɛrifay fon ɔ email. Awtgɔin kɔl/tɛks kin sho yu Chatforia nɔmba.
profile.errSmsDest: Chuz at lis wan dɛstineshɔn (fon ɔ email).
profile.errQuietHours: Kwaet awa dɛn fo bi bitwin 0 en 23.

chat.selectPrompt: Chuz wan tɛks ɔ chat rɔm fɔ stat chat
chat.emptySubtitle: Sɛn wan mesij fɔ stat chat.

status.filesNote: Up to 5 fayl. 24 awa expaya bɔbɔ.

sidebar.loginPrompt: Log in fɔ edit yu settings.

premium.heading: Go Premium
premium.description: Opɔn pawa fɛchɔ dɛn & kɔmɔt ads.

auth.headline: Sikyoa, global mesijin wit insɒnt transleshon
auth.description: End-to-end enkripshɔn, AI transleshon, disapia mesij dɛn, en voys/vídeo kɔl dɛn.

feature.disappearing: Disapia mesij dɛn & rid rɛsit dɛn
feature.privacy: Praivasi fɔs. Yu data, na yu kɔntrol.

auth.desktopTip: Na desktop? Skɛn wit yu fon fɔ get di app.
auth.subhead: Praivit, enkriptid, en translet mesijin — chachra!
auth.tip: Yu fít yus Chatforia pan eni dɪvays — ɔ download di app fɔ di best ekspiriyens.
auth.scanHint: Skɛn fɔ download di app ɔ open na brawsa.

home.title: Hom
home.subheader: Sɛn wan mesij fɔ stat chat.

press.title: Prɛs
press.contact: Fɔ midia tɔk, rɛch wi na press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Fɔ midia tɔk, rɛch wi na press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia na sikyoa mesenja wit insɒnt transleshon en E2E enkripshɔn, mek global tɔk ezy en praivit.
press.assetsText: Logo dɛn, skrinshɔt dɛn, en prɔdɔkt imɛjri (de kam sun).

careers.title: Karia dɛn
careers.intro: Wi na smɔl tim we de bild wan praivit, global mesenja. If yu kea bɔt enkripshɔn, aksesibiliti, en fayn UX, wi go glad fɔ yeri fram yu.
careers.openRoles: Open rol dɛn: Injiniarin (Ful-stak, iOS, Android), Prɔdɔkt, Sɛpɔt.
careers.apply: Aw fɔ apply: Email yu rizum/lin dɛn go jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Abɔut Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia na sikyoa, mɔtilanwesh mesenja wit end-to-end enkripshɔn, insɒnt transleshon, en voys/vídeo kɔl dɛn. Wi misyɔn simpol: ɛp pipul kɔnɛkt—sɛfli, praivitli, en akrɔs lanwesh dɛn.

values.access: Aksɛs fɔ ɔl man: Auto-translet 100+ lanwesh dɛn.
values.control: Kɔntrol: Disapia mesij dɛn & rid rɛsit dɛn na opshɔn.

about.howDescription: Mesij dɛn de enkrip na yu dɪvays bifo den lef am. Transleshon, backup, en dɪvays synk plan so dat wi sɒmba nɔ si mɔ dan we nid.

advertise.title: Advertais wit Chatforia
advertise.description: Rish engɛjd mesijin yuzas wit klin, brand-sɛf plesment dɛn. Wi de ofa bana invɛntɔri na top spɔt dɛn, sponsɔship, en haus promo. Premium yuzas nɔ de si ads.

adsense.withPubId: Wi de yus Google AdSense fɔ ads. If yu wan target wi tru Google Ads, yus publisher ID {{pubId}} en aks fɔ manij plesment pan di yunit dɛn we de dɔŋ ya. Dairɛkt sponsɔship dɛn de — yus di fɔm.
adsense.noPubId: Wi de yus Google AdSense fɔ ads. Dairɛkt sponsɔship dɛn sef de — yus di fɔm dɔŋ.

placement.acceptedSizes: Says dɛn we wi de aksept

advertise.noPlacements: Nɔ gɛt plesment kɔnfígɔ yet. Put dɛn na ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Bɔku taim dɛn na chat UI, pipul de kam bɔku
why.sponsoredMoments: Sponsɔd momɛn dɛn (e.g., “Start a Chat” modal) de
why.deals: Dairɛkt dil dɛn ɔ prɔgramatik tru AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Tɛnki! Yu inkwairi don kam. Wi go fɔlɔp shɔtli.
form.missingRequired: Plis fil nɛm, email, en mesij.
form.successToast: Tɛnki! Wi go tɔk tu yu sun.
form.mailtoInfo: Wi de opɔn yu email klient fɔ sɛn di inkwairi…
form.messagePlaceholder: Tagetin, dɛt dɛn, KPI dɛn, plesment we yu laik…

legal.disclaimerStart: Wen yu sɔbmit, yu agri wit wi

upgrade.title: Upgrade
upgrade.subtitle: Chuz di kɔrɛkt plan fɔ yu: go ad-frí wit Plus, ɔ get ol wi pawa fɛchɔ dɛn wit Premium.

scheduleBanner.title: Sɔbskripsyɔn go end
scheduleBanner.body: Yu go go bak to Free na

features.ringtones: Kɔstɔm rington dɛn & mesij ton dɛn

features.sameFeatures: Di sɛm fɛchɔ dɛn lek Mɔntli

gettingStarted.title: Get Stat
gettingStarted.subtitle: Nyu to Chatforia? Dis kwik stat go sho yu di iportan wan dɛn so yu go stat yus am fayn-fayn.

alert.text: Dis gaid go gro as wi de lɔnch nyu fɛchɔ dɛn. If sɔntin de mis, tɛl wi tru

section1.title: 1) Mek yu akɔnt
section1.loginText: wit di akɔnt we yu gɛt.

section2.title: 2) Stat mesijin
section2.item1: Mek DM ɔ Grup en sɛn yu fɔs mesij.
section2.item2: Yus insɒnt transleshon fɔ chat akrɔs 100+ lanwesh dɛn.
section2.item3: Try disapia mesij dɛn en rid rɛsit dɛn na Profil → Praivasi.

section3.title: 3) Go fɔda
section3.item1Part2: pɛj (Plus = ad-frí, Premium = ful fɛchɔ dɛn).
section3.item2Part1: Link mɔ dɪvays dɛn en set enkrip backup dɛn na

account.q: Aw a go mek ɔ risɔva mi akɔnt?
account.a: Download di app ɔ yus web, tɔp “Mek akɔnt”, vɛrifay yu email/fon. Fɔ risɔva, yus “Fɔgɛt paswɔd”.

privacy.q: Na end-to-end enkripshɔn de pan mesij dɛn?
privacy.a: Yɛs. Mesij dɛn en kɔl dɛn na end-to-end enkriptid na di normol. Na onli yu en di rɛsipiyɛnt kin rid am.

translate.a: On “Auto-translet” na Settings → Apierɛns & Lanwesh. Wi de translet na dɪvays we posibul, if nɔto so, tru sikyoa API dɛn wit smɔ metadata.

contact.a: Rɛch wi na support@chatforia.com. Put skrinshɔt dɛn en yu app vɛshɔn.

contact.title: Kontak Wi
contact.successMsg: Tɛnki—wi tim go riplae tru email.
contact.errorSend: Nɔbul fɔ sɛn. Plis email support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Dis Praivasi Polisi xplɛnin aw Chatforia (“wi”, “wi sɛf”) de kɔlɛkt, yus, en shea infɔmeshɔn we yu de yus wi app dɛn en sɔvis dɛn. Wi dɛzayn Chatforia fɔ minimais di data we wi kin si.

infoWeCollect.title: Infɔmeshɔn we wi de kɔlɛkt
infoWeCollect.account: Akɔnt info (lek email/fon) fɔ mek en sikyoa yu akɔnt.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Enkriptid kɔntɛn (mesij/kɔl dɛn) na E2E; wi nɔ fít rid am.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Daignɔstik/yusidata lek krash lɔg dɛn, dɪvays tayp, ɔ smɔ analitiks fɔ impruv pɛfɔm.

howWeUse.title: Aw wi de yus infɔmeshɔn
howWeUse.provide: Gi en sikyoa di sɔvis (ɔt, spam/abios dɛtɛkshɔn).

sharing.title: Shearin
sharing.body: Wi nɔ de sɛl pɔsinadata. Wi fít shea smɔ data wit prɔsɛsa dɛn (lek push nɔtifike-shɔn, analitiks) unda strikt kɔntrat dɛn.

rights.title: Yu rayt dɛn
rights.body: Dɔŋ pan yu rigin (lek GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), yu fít rikwɛst akses, kɔrɛkshɔn, dèlit, ɔ ɔpt-awt frɔn sɔntin prɔsɛsin. Kontak: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Data ritenshɔn & sikyoriti
retention.body: Wi de kip onli wetin nid fɔ rɔn di sɔvis en yus indɔstri-stándad sikyoriti. E2E kɔntɛn wi nɔ fít dɛkrip am.

children.title: Pikindɛm
children.body: Chatforia nɔ to pikindɛm unda 13 (ɔ as yu lokal lɔ dɔn sidɔm).

changes.title: Chenj dɛn
changes.body: Wi go post ɔpdet dɛn ya en chenj di “Las ɔpdet” dɛt.

intro.body: If yu de yus Chatforia, dat min se yu agri wit di Tɛms ya. If yu nɔ agri, nɔ yus di sɔvis.

accounts.title: Akɔnt dɛn
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Gi kɔrɛkt infɔ en kip kɔd dɛn sikyoa.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Yu na di rɛspɔnsibul pɔsin fɔ wetin apɔn na yu akɔnt.

acceptableUse.title: Aksɛptabul Yus
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Nɔ put iligal, abius, ɔ infrinj kɔntɛn; nɔ spam ɔ ɔtomɛtit abios.

yourContent.title: Yu kɔntɛn
yourContent.body: Yu stil get yu rayt pan yu kɔntɛn. Yu gi wi di rayt we nid fɔ rɔn di sɔvis (lek rɔtin, stɔrej, transleshon).

disclaimer.title: Disklɛma & liabiliti
disclaimer.body: Sɔvis de “as is” witɔut wáranti. So te di lɔ alaw wi, Chatforia nɔ gɛt liabiliti fɔ indirekt ɔ kɔnsiikwenshal damɛj dɛn.

changes.title: Chenj dɛn
changes.body: Wi fít ɔpdet dɛn tɛms; if yu kɔntinyu yus am afta chenj, dat min se yu agri.

doNotSell.title: Nɔ Sɛl ɔ Shea Mi Pɔsina Infɔmeshɔn
doNotSell.body: Chatforia nɔ de sɛl pɔsina infɔmeshɔn. Klain pipl na Kalifɔnia stil fít sɔbmit rikwɛst andat CPRA wit di bɔtin dɔŋ.

cookies.title: Kuki Settings
cookies.body: Chatforia de yus smɔ kuki dɛn (lek s ɛshɔn, sikyoriti). Wi nɔ de yus tɔd-pati ads kuki dɛn. Manij kuki dɛn tru yu brawsa settings.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Nɔbul fɔ lɔd fon nɔmba status.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Nɔ gɛt nɔmba yèt. Pik wan bay ariya kod fɔ stat tɛkst.

startChatModal.title: Stat wan chat
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Taip nɛm, yuzanem, fon, ɔ email…
startChatModal.startWithSelected: Stat chat wit di wan dɛn we yu pɔint
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Taip yuzanem ɔ fon en pres Sɛch.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Fon/email we yu enta go avɛlibul afta yu sev dɛn as kontaks.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Nɔbul fɔ stat chat wit di pɔint rɛsipiyɛnt dɛn.

sounds.freeNotice: Yu de pan Free — premium ton dɛn go sho bɔ dɛn lɔk. Upgrade fɔ opɔn ɔl.

aiSettings.title: AI Settings
aiSettings.controlIntro: Kɔntrol transleshon, smart riplae dɛn, en ForiaBot ɔto-rɛspɔns dɛn.
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Sɛn di las smɔl inkomin mesij dɛn (klin wan) go AI fɔ sɔjest kwik riplae dɛn.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Mask pɔfániti na AI sɔjɛshɔn dɛn
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: If e on, AI ripɔns dɛn we get bad wɔd go mask

accessibilitySettings.title: Aksesibiliti & Alat dɛn
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Opshɔn dɛn fɔ mek Chatforia isi fɔ yus witawt sɔnd.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: I stat na nɔmɔl sayz. Inkris am if yu laik biga teks na aksesibiliti settings.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Vizual alat fɔ mesij dɛn & kɔl dɛn
Sho bana dɛn en taitul blink so yu nɔ go mis aktiviti.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Vibret we nyu mesij kɔm (we dɪvays sɔpɔt am)
Mek dɪvays vibret wit nɔtifike-shɔn.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Flash skrin we kɔl de kam
Bif-brait flash we kɔl de rin.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Auto-transkraib voys nɔt dɛn
Atach transkrip go di ɔdio mesij dɛn we yu rɛsiv.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlerts: Vizual alat fɔ mesij dɛn & kɔl dɛn
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Sho bana dɛn en taitul blink so yu nɔ go mis aktiviti.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Vibret we nyu mesij kɔm (we sɔpɔt)
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: Flas skrin we kɔl de kam
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Smɔ brait flash we kɔl de rin.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Kip onli saifàtɛkst pan sẹva. I go tɔnɔf AI/Translet en mɔdɛreshɔn privyu dɛn.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Sɛch bay alias, nɛm, yuzanem, ɔ fon
peoplePage.quickStartDesc: Smɔ smɔ fas we go mek yu stat kwik.
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Shea yu invite link fɔ stat chat chachra.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Kip in tɔch pan di go wit Chatforia fɔ iOS en Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Tip: Yu mesij dɛn de synk kɔs web en mobayl.

randomChat.title: Random Chat
randomChat.description: Mit sɔmbɔdi nyu chachra. Wi go mat yu en open wan tɛmprari chat rɔm.
randomChat.saveGuard: Na onli man-to-man chat dɛn yu kin sev
